00020 #include <stdio.h>
00021 #include <stdlib.h>
00022 #include <errno.h>
00023 #include <string.h>
00024 #include "libphonefirewall.h" 
00025 
00026 #define BLACKLIST_PREFIX "db/blacklist_"
00027 #define WHITELIST_PREFIX "db/whitelist_"
00028 #define FILENAME_SIZE 256
00029 
00030 static char* DELIM = "::";
00031 
00032 char filename[FILENAME_SIZE];
00033 
00034 int set_filename(char *prefix, int country_code, int area_code) {
00035         snprintf(filename, sizeof(filename), "%s%d-%d", prefix, country_code, area_code);
00036         if ( NULL != filename ) return 0;
00037         else return -ENOENT;
00038 }
00039 
00040 int add_blacklist_entry(int country_code, int area_code, unsigned long long number, char *name, char *reason, int priority) {
00041         if ( 0 != set_filename(BLACKLIST_PREFIX, country_code, area_code) ) return errno;
00042 
00043         FILE *file;
00044 
00045         if ( NULL == (file = fopen(filename, "a+"))) return -EINVAL;
00046         fprintf(file, "%d%s%lld%s%d%s%d%s%s%s%s\n", priority, DELIM, number, DELIM, country_code, DELIM, area_code, DELIM, name, DELIM, reason);
00047 
00048         fflush(file);
00049         fclose(file);
00050 
00051         return 0;
00052 }
00053 
00054 int add_whitelist_entry(int country_code, int area_code, unsigned long long number, char *name, char *reason, int priority) {
00055         if ( 0 != set_filename(WHITELIST_PREFIX, country_code, area_code) ) return errno;
00056 
00057         FILE *file;
00058 
00059         if ( NULL == (file = fopen(filename, "a+"))) return -EINVAL;
00060         fprintf(file, "%d%s%lld%s%d%s%d%s%s%s%s\n", priority, DELIM, number, DELIM, country_code, DELIM, area_code, DELIM, name, DELIM, reason);
00061         
00062         fflush(file);
00063         fclose(file);
00064 
00065         return 0;
00066 }
00067 
00068 int rm_blacklist_entry (unsigned long long number) {
00069         return -ENOSYS;
00070 }
00071 
00072 int rm_whitelist_entry (unsigned long long number) {
00073         return -ENOSYS;
00074 }
00075 
00076 char *check_blacklist_entry(int country_code, int area_code, unsigned long long number, int priority) {
00077         if ( 0 != set_filename(BLACKLIST_PREFIX, country_code, area_code) ) return NULL;
00078 
00079         FILE *file;
00080 
00081         if ( NULL == (file = fopen(filename, "a+"))) return NULL;
00082 
00083         char line[MAX_LINE_LENGTH];
00084         char *substr = NULL; 
00085         char strnumber[MAX_LINE_LENGTH];
00086         char *hit = NULL;
00087         int tmppriority;
00088 
00089         snprintf(strnumber, sizeof(strnumber), "%lld", number);
00090 
00091         while ( !feof(file) ) {
00092                 if( 0 != fgets(line, sizeof(line), file) ) {
00093                         substr = strtok(line, DELIM);
00094                         tmppriority = atoi(substr);
00095                         if ( tmppriority >= priority ) {
00096                                 substr = strtok(NULL, DELIM);
00097                                 if ( 0 == strcmp(substr, strnumber)  ) {
00098                                         hit = substr;
00099                                         fclose(file);
00100                                         return hit;
00101                                 }
00102                         }
00103                 } 
00104         }
00105 
00106         fclose(file);
00107         return hit;
00108 }
00109 
00110 char *check_whitelist_entry(int country_code, int area_code, unsigned long long number, int priority) {
